short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Randomizes the capitalization of all text and causes immence pain.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension continuously randomizes the capitalization of every individual letter on almost all websites. It is made cause pain and struggle when reading web pages and confusion for anyone who doesn't know that you did.
